purpleculture_pinyin:
mǎn
Manchu ethnic group; to fill; full; filled; packed; fully; completely; quite; to reach the limit; to satisfy; satisfied; contented
Маньчжурская этническая группа; заполнять; полный; заполненный; упакованы; от корки до корки; полностью; довольно; достичь предела; удовлетворить; довольный; доволен

heisig_chinese_memo: Twenty flowers are getting watered.  They are in flower pots which sit in the holes of a yoke.  It wasn't being used for animals anymore so the owner thought he would make it full with flower pots holder.
Ru_trainchinese:
mǎn: (нареч/прил/глаг) полностью; полный (чего-то); целый, весь; наполнять; завершаться, истекать (о времени)
mǎn: (графема) быть довольным; самодовольный, тщеславный
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: These flowers are getting watered.  They are in flower pots which sit in the holes of a yoke.  It wasn't being used for animals anymore so the owner thought he would make it full with flower pots holder.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and "㒼", the original meaning is full and full. "Shuowen": "Ying overflowing. From the water, 㒼 sound." "Zhuangzi•Tianyun": "The valley is full of valleys, and the valleys are full."

" Full " can also mean satisfaction. "Han Shu·Shihuo Zhi 1": "Mang had it in the past, but his heart was not satisfied, and the Han family system was narrow and sparse."

" Full " can also mean complacency. "Shu‧Zhongguozhi": "Germany is new and new, and all nations are cherished; self-satisfied, the nine clans are not."

" Full " also means achievement. "Lu Shi Chunqiu-Guixin": "If you speak without faith, Pepsi is dissatisfied."

" Full " is also used to mean whole and whole. Tang Huangchao, "Not the second chrysanthemum": "When the autumn comes on September 8, I will kill all the flowers after they bloom; the fragrance of the sky will flow through Chang'an, and the city will be full of golden armor."

" Full " also means the deadline. "Southern History ‧ Yu Ji Biography": "The officials who lived before and after have not reached the end of their ranks, and they will be retired by oneself after the arbitration month." It also means absolute speaking and no room left. Chapter 71: "The sky and the earth are so big, why is there no such thing? Is it that since ancient times, we have only been together? Don't say it all!"
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and "㒼", the original meaning is full and full.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「㒼」聲，本義為充盈，充滿。《說文》：「盈溢也。从水，㒼聲。」 《莊子‧天運》：「在谷滿谷，在阬滿阬。」成玄英疏：「乃谷乃阬，悉皆盈滿。」

　　「滿」也可表示滿足。《漢書‧食貨志上》：「莽一朝有之，其心意未滿，狹小漢家制度，以為疏闊。」

　　「滿」還可表示自滿。《書‧仲虺之誥》：「德日新，萬邦惟懷；志自滿，九族乃離。」

　　「滿」亦表示成就。《呂氏春秋‧貴信》：「以言非信，則百事不滿也。」

　　「滿」還用作表示全、整個。唐黃巢〈不第後賦菊〉：「待到秋來九月八，我花開後百花殺；沖天香陣透長安，滿城盡帶黃金甲。」

　　「滿」又表示到達期限，《南史‧虞寄傳》：「前後所居官，未嘗至秩滿，裁期月，便自求解退。」也表示說話絕對，不留餘地，《鏡花緣》第71回：「天地之大，何所不有，難道自古至今，就只我們聚過？這話不要說滿了！」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「㒼」聲，本義為充盈，充滿。

HSK 4: 滿,满
滿滿RS
满满 		fill, full, satisfied
  • water 氵 used in a balance 㒼: it has to be filled
  • ⓢ modf. 滿 → 满 (兩 → 两)
(Simplified: 满)
Chinese Definition: Synonym: 足
Antonyms: 缺 空
Pictophonetic: 㒼 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 㒼 [ mán ] average; equivalent
①全部充實，沒有餘地：滿足。滿意。充滿。飽滿。美滿。滿腔熱血。琳琅滿目。滿載而歸。
②到了一定的限度：滿員。滿月。不滿週歲。
③驕傲，不虛心：自滿。志得意滿。
④十分，全：滿世界(到處)。滿堂灌。滿天飛。滿園春色。
⑤使滿，斟酒：滿上一杯酒。
⑥中國少數民族，主要分佈於遼寧、黑龍江、吉林、河北等省和北京市、內蒙古自治區：滿族。滿文。滿漢全席。
⑦姓氏。
滿足 [ mǎn zú ]: to satisfy; to meet (the needs of); satisfied; content
滿意 [ mǎn yì ]: satisfied; pleased; to one's satisfaction

Story: These flowers are getting watered. They are in flower pots which sit in the holes of a yoke. It wasn't being used for animals anymore so the owner thought he would make it full with flower pots holder.
Kind: traditional

從「 水 」，「 㒼 」聲，本義為充盈，充滿。《說文》：「盈溢也。从水，㒼聲。」 《莊子‧天運》：「在谷滿谷，在阬滿阬。」成玄英疏：「乃谷乃阬，悉皆盈滿。」 「 滿 」也可表示滿足。《漢書‧食貨志上》：「莽一朝有之，其心意未滿，狹小漢家制度，以為疏闊。」 「 滿 」還可表示自滿。《書‧仲虺之誥》：「德日新，萬邦惟懷；志自滿，九族乃離。」 「 滿 」亦表示成就。《呂氏春秋‧貴信》：「以言非信，則百事不滿也。」 「 滿 」還用作表示全、整個。唐黃巢〈不第後賦菊〉：「待到秋來九月八，我花開後百花殺；沖天香陣透長安，滿城盡帶黃金甲。」 「 滿 」又表示到達期限，《南史‧虞寄傳》：「前後所居官，未嘗至秩滿，裁期月，便自求解退。」也表示說話絕對，不留餘地，《鏡花緣》第71回：「天地之大，何所不有，難道自古至今，就只我們聚過？這話不要說滿了！」
From the sound of " water" and " 㒼", the original meaning is full and full. "Shuowen": "Ying overflowing. From the water, 㒼 sound." "Zhuangzi•Tianyun": "The valley is full of valleys, and the valleys are full." " Full" can also mean satisfaction. "Han Shu·Shihuo Zhi 1": "Mang had it in the past, but his heart was not satisfied, and the Han family system was narrow and sparse." " Full" can also mean complacency. "Shu‧Zhongguozhi": "Germany is new and new, and all nations are cherished; self-satisfied, the nine clans are not." " Full" also means achievement. "Lu Shi Chunqiu-Guixin": "If you speak without faith, Pepsi is dissatisfied." " Full" is also used to mean whole and whole. Tang Huangchao, "Not the second chrysanthemum": "When the autumn comes on September 8, I will kill all the flowers after they bloom; the fragrance of the sky will flow through Chang'an, and the city will be full of golden armor." " Full" also means the deadline. "Southern History ‧ Yu Ji Biography": "The officials who lived before and after have not reached the end of their ranks, and they will be retired by oneself after the arbitration month." It also means absolute speaking and no room left. Chapter 71: "The sky and the earth are so big, why is there no such thing? Is it that since ancient times, we have only been together? Don't say it all!"

滿字的基本解释

滿
mǎn
见“满”。

滿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǎn］
［《廣韻》莫旱切，上緩，明。］
亦作“満1”。“满1”的繁体字。
(1)充满；布满。
(2)谓饱满，充实。
(3)使之满。
(4)足；满足。
(5)骄傲自满。
(6)成就；完成。
(7)达到期限。
(8)射箭时，弯弓引弦至箭头刚露出弓把的位置。
(9)特指月圆。
(10)谓说话不留余地，太绝对。
(11)全；遍。
(12)很。
(13)通“謾”。参见“滿讕”。
(14)戏曲髯口（假须）的一种。
(15)我国少数民族名。女真族后裔，清太宗皇太极改称满洲，通称满族。参见“滿族”。
(16)姓。汉有满昌。见《汉书·儒林传·后苍》。
[②]［mèn］
［《集韻》莫困切，去恨，明。］
“满2”的繁体字。
(1)通“懣”。烦闷。
(2)中医学名词。胀满；壅滞。
(3)用同“們”。

滿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滿； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页644第18
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【正韻】莫旱切【集韻】母伴切，?音懣。【說文】盈溢也。【書·大禹謨】不自滿假。【傳】滿謂盈實。【正義】滿以器喩，故爲盈實。【管子·霸言篇】地大而不爲，命曰土滿。人衆而不理，命曰人滿。兵威而不止，命曰武滿。　又姓，晉滿奮。　又【集韻】莫困切，音悶。同懣。【說文】煩也。或省作滿。【前漢·霍光傳】憂滿不食。　又【韻補】叶美辨切，音免。【蘇軾詩】南都從事亦學道，不恤枯腸誇腦滿。問羊他日到金華，應時相將遊閬苑。又?、満、?。

滿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滿字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
full
mǎn

full
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǎn］
["Guangyun" does not cut dry, slow up, and clear. ]
Also known as "満1". Traditional characters of "满1".
(1) Full; full.
(2) It is full and full.
(3) Make it full.
(4) Full; satisfied.
(5) Proud and complacent.
(6) Achievement; completion.
(7) The deadline is reached.
(8) When shooting an arrow, bend the bow to draw the string to the position where the arrow just exposed the bow handle.
(9) Specifically refers to the full moon.
(10) It is said that there is no room for speaking, and it is too absolute.
(11) All; times.
(12) Very.
(13) Through "谩". See "fullness".
(14) A kind of Xiqu 鯯口 (false beard).
(15) The names of ethnic minorities in our country. A descendant of the Jurchen tribe, Emperor Taizong of the Qing Dynasty was renamed Manchu by Emperor Taiji, generally known as Manchu. See "Manchu".
(16) Last name. Han Youmanchang. See "Hanshu·The Biography of Rulin·Hou Cang".
[②]［mèn］
["Jiyun" is not difficult to cut, to hate, to be clear. ]
Traditional characters of "满2".
(1) Through "懑". Bored.
(2) Chinese medical terms. Fullness; stagnation.
(3) Use the same "men".
